level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: ยง 3-109 Definitions. For the purposes of this chapter: 1. "Alcoholic beverage" shall mean an alcoholic beverage as that term is defined by section three of the alcoholic beverage control law but shall not include patented medicine. 2. "Rifle" and "shotgun" shall mean a rifle and shotgun as those terms are defined by section 10-301 of the code.
